mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY_REMIND SET READ_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE THEME_ID = #{0} AND TO_USERID = #{1} AND READ_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.VERSION, A.FLAG, A.READ_FLAG, A.FROM_USERID, (SELECT B.USER_NAME FROM LOGIN_DATA B WHERE A.FROM_USERID = B.USERID) FROM_USER_NAME, A.TO_USERID, A.THEME_ID, (SELECT C.THEME_CONTENT FROM FORUM_THEME C WHERE C.ID = A.THEME_ID) THEME_NAME, A.CONTENT_ID, SUBSTRING(A.CREATE_TIME,1,10) CREATE_TIME, A.CUSTOM1, A.CUSTOM2, A.CUSTOM3, A.CUSTOM4, A.CUSTOM5 FROM REPLY_REMIND A WHERE A.TO_USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC;
